column4: I get this: E: Could not open lock file /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (13 Permission denied)
E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), are you root?
what same error? it should print the process that has that file open! no error!
E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), are you root?
did you run the command I told you to?!
No output from that, just got to the command line again.
and no program has that file open? hmm that's weird :-/
Not what I can think of. I have gAIM, XMMS and Mozilla running except the terminal.
I do have a update-tray (red thing with arrows) that say taht I have some downloads I need. Could that interrupt?
